name: nextcloud-notes
description: Nextcloud Notes is a self-hosted note-taking application that uses Markdown with simple editing and sharing features. Notes sync across devices through the Nextcloud ecosystem.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes with Markdown syntax and live preview rendering

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and edit notes from web, desktop, and mobile apps

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find notes instantly by searching titles or content

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Edit notes without internet connection with automatic sync when online

features.title: Version History
features.description: View and restore previous versions of notes from edit history

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Native iOS and Android apps for note-taking on the go
